verses.verse: A <S%H7892>Song<s%> of <S%H4609>degrees<s%>. They that <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be as <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, which cannot be <S%H4131>removed<s%>, but <S%H3427>abideth<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

As the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> are round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, so the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is round <S%H5439>about<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> from henceforth even <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

For the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of the <S%H7562>wicked<s%> shall not <S%H5117>rest<s%> upon the <S%H1486>lot<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>; <S%H4616>lest<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> put <S%H7971>forth<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> unto <S%H5766>iniquity<s%>. the wicked: Heb. wickedness
Do <S%H2895>good<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, unto those that be <S%H2896>good<s%>, and to them that are <S%H3477>upright<s%> in their <S%H3826>hearts<s%>.

As for such as turn <S%H5186>aside<s%> unto their crooked <S%H6128>ways<s%>, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall lead them <S%H3212>forth<s%> with the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%>: but <S%H7965>peace<s%> shall be upon <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
